definition: A person who performs in plays, movies, or television shows, portraying characters and bringing them to life through their acting skills. This term is commonly used to refer to individuals who work professionally in the field of acting, entertaining audiences through their performances.

examples.german: Sie hat als Schauspielerin in vielen Filmen mitgewirkt.
examples.english: She has acted in many movies as an actress.

examples.german: Der Schauspieler spielt die Hauptrolle in dem Theaterstück.
examples.english: The actor plays the lead role in the play.

examples.german: Die Schauspielerin gewann einen Preis für ihre herausragende Leistung.
examples.english: The actress won an award for her outstanding performance.

examples.german: Er hat eine lange Karriere als Schauspieler hinter sich.
examples.english: He has a long career as an actor behind him.
